channel.title: BuddyTV
channel.description: BuddyTV - TV News, Spoilers, Pictures, Profiles, Forums, and Live Commentary

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' Week 5 Results Prediction: Victor Ortiz Gets KO'd
item.description:
Tuesday night another Dancing with the Stars pair will be eliminated. Will one of the funny men be voted off Tuesday night? Maybe boxer Victor Ortiz will finally get knocked out and put out of his misery. Could America throw Dancing with the Stars its first twist of season 16 by voting off a surprise contestant?

Based on how the voting has gone so far this season, there are three stars in clear jeopardy of being eliminated. D.L. Hughley, Andy Dick, and Victor Ortiz are the bottom three dancers and have found themselves consistently at the bottom of the vote totals so far this season. The question is, which one of these three dancers will be going home on Tuesday nights results show?
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Castle' Recap: Murder By Bigfoot?
item.description: This season of Castle has had plenty of big, serious episodes. We found out the identity of Castle's father, Alexis was kidnapped, and Beckett dived further into the conspiracy around her mother's death. So it's been a nice break to jump back into the more silly and lighthearted side of the show. This episode, centered entirely around Castle's Mulder-like belief in the existence of Bigfoot, wasn't remotely serious but was a zany good time.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: Can't Keep Up? Here's a Ranking of The 10 Most-Engaged TV Shows
item.description:
If you think that the self-reporting diary methodologies used to create TV ratings are confusing, we completely understand. TV ratings are controversial science, fraught with criticisms of accuracy. But TV ratings are still the benchmarks used for decision making by networks, producers, advertisers, and ultimately TV viewers.

Here at BuddyTV, we use a database of over 1 million programs to help you quickly find what to watch. Combined with interaction data from our users, we've gathered a number of fascinating insights we want to share.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Following' Recap: Joe Has a Very Bad Day
item.description: After a few episodes that didn't move the story forward much, The Following turned things around in "Havenport." It was suspenseful and unpredictable. Through Joe's arrogance and his ill-advised use of his Followers, Joe was put into reactive mode on multiple levels for the first time since he escaped from prison. When the FBI finally got a big win by capturing Roderick and then rescuing Joey, Joe was forced to change up his plans both in the Follower House and against Ryan Hardy.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Real Housewives of Orange County' Recap: Briana Bans Brooks
item.description: Tonight on The Real Housewives of Orange County, Vicki continues to try and sway Briana's opinion of Brooks. We get to meet new housewife Lydia, who wants to include Heather and Terry's home in her lifestyle magazine. The new wife on the block shares some scary similarities with Alexis that don't go unnoticed by Heather. Meanwhile, Vicki and Tamra grow closer.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Bones' Recap: Booth Confronts His Mommy Issues
item.description: Parental issues, stripping and a wedding -- these things aren't all mutually exclusive in "The Party in the Pants." With the season winding down, did the end of the episode clue us in on the future path of Brennan and Booth?
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'The Voice' Recap: Let the Battles Begin
item.description: The blind auditions are over and now the battle rounds begin on The Voice season 4. Two singers enter (or three, in some cases), but only one leaves. Or two, if one of the coaches uses a Steal.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' Recap: Rising to Len's Side-by-Side Challenge
item.description:
While the horrific events in Boston have shuffled parts of tonight's TV schedule around, Dancing with the Stars is expected to air as planned. Maks will be returning as part of some sort of professional comparison initiative, and we'll be live-blogging the proceedings as always.

Live blog starts now:
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'NCIS' Season 10 Celebration: The 10 Best Abby Episodes
item.description: NCIS season 10 has been a pretty epic season so far. With just a few episodes left, we thought we'd take a look back at some of our favorite episodes throughout the past 10 years. First up, we shine the spotlight on everyone's favorite forensic tech and count down the top 10 Abby episodes. Be sure to stay tuned for more count downs, including the top 10 Tony episodes, top 10 Ziva episodes and more.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: Coverage of Boston Marathon Bombing Preempts 'Revolution'
item.description: Tragedy struck the United States on Monday when two explosions occurred at the finish line of the Boston Marathon, injuring at least 100 people with two confirmed dead. The two explosions occurred within seconds of each other and initial reports noted multiple amputations due to the bombs.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Supernatural' Brings an Old Flame Back for 'Clip Show' Episode
item.description: Supernatural loves to bring back guest stars, but this year the show is digging way back for a rather surprising return in an upcoming episode.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Glee' Spoilers: Kate Hudson, Sarah Jessica Parker and More Return in Final 4 Episodes
item.description: Glee is heading towards a big finale on May 9, and while we already know it will feature guest stars Patty Duke and Meredith Baxter and a marriage proposal, there's plenty more coming in the weeks ahead.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: End of the Road: Chuck and Wynona's Trek on 'The Amazing Race'
item.description: When married couple Chuck and Wynona weren?t fighting while struggling in the race, they were a delight to watch. But with them, the clock was always ticking and Wynona was a big reason why. While Wynona?s lack of physical strength hurt them, their inability to follow the rules got them booted . Let?s take a look back on their time on The Amazing Race.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Glee' Episode 4.19 Songs: Rachel Duets with Her Mom
item.description: After spending an entire episode at McKinley High last week during which the controversial school shooting took place, it's time to check back in with Rachel because her Funny Girl audition is finally here. Nostalgia is in the air as she reprises the song that put Glee on the map: "Don't Stop Believin'." Rachel's mother Shelby, played by the fabulous Idina Menzel, returns to help her prepare. And New Directions is doing some preparations of their own. Regionals is right around the corner, so they whip out some original songs written by none other than, Marley.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Videos] Watch Two Team Adam Battle Rounds from 'The Voice' Season 4
item.description: The Battle Rounds of The Voice begin tonight at 8pm on NBC, and they are always an exciting opportunity for thrilling performances and the agony of defeat.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Defiance' Review: A Complicated Yet Familiar Alien Drama
item.description: Defiance is certainly an ambitious show in every sense of the word. The Syfy drama, premiering Monday, April 15 at 9pm with a two-hour pilot, takes place 33 years after aliens come to Earth, terra-form the environment, and begin to cohabitate the new planet with humans. If that's not enough, Syfy also has an online game that explores the same universe, giving fans the chance to play along with the series.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Video] 'The Vampire Diaries' Sneak Peek: Who Steals Her Friend's Prom Dress?
item.description: It's time for the prom on The Vampire Diaries. Mystic Falls may be an unusual town with vampire and witches in attendance, but it's still all about the dress. In "Pictures of You," the girls look stunning in their gorgeous gowns with their fancy hair and make-up, while the guys look dapper in their formal evening attire. Though, the strained relationship between Elena and Caroline takes a petty teenage twist when it comes to their dresses.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Video] 'Hawaii Five-0' Episode 3.20 Preview: More Facts are Revealed in a Series Prequel
item.description: Hawaii Five-0 season 3 continues on Monday, April 15, 2013 with an episode called "Olelo Pa'a" (Hawaiian for "The Promise"). Check out the episode synopsis and a couple of sneak peek videos below to find out what happened to Steve before he joined Five-0.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Video] 'Castle' Episode 5.20 Preview: Castle Gets Super-Excited Over Bigfoot
item.description: Castle season 5 continues on Monday, April 15 with an episode called "The Fast and the Furriest." Check out the synopsis and sneak peek videos below to see what happens when the teams tracks down a creature that could be Bigfoot.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Video] 'Bones' Episode 8.22 Preview: Has Booth's Mom Truly Make Amends?
item.description: Bones season 8 continues on Monday, April 15 with an episode called "The Party in the Pants." Check out four sneak peek videos below and see what happens when Booth's mother comes back into his life after 24 years.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Video] 'Revolution' Preview: Searching for a Nuke in Georgia
item.description: On Revolution, the Matheson gang has split up. Last Monday, Rachel and Aaron left on a suicide mission to the Tower. In "The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia," Miles, Charlie and Nora leave the Monroe Republic in search of a nuclear bomb. Monroe moved forward with his plan to conquer the other republics first with the Georgia Federation and they will try to stop him.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: [Video] 'The Following' Sneak Peeks: Roderick and Mike Meet Again
item.description: Could the FBI finally make a big break on the case after being continually thwarted by Joe and his Followers? On last week's The Following, Roderick inserted himself into the investigation and on "Havenport" that ends up being a mistake. With Mike out of the hospital and back on the case, his path crosses with the man who had him beat almost to death.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Awkward' Season 3: Where We Left Off and What's to Come
item.description: Things are about to get "Awkward" as MTV's hit teen comedy returns for an extended third season on April 16th with a double dose of episodes. Ballooning the show from it's normal 12 to an unprecedented 20 episodes means more Jenna, Matty, Jake, and Sadie than ever before.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: 'Dancing with the Stars' Week 5 Preview: The Pros Return for Len Goodman's Side-By-Side Challenge
item.description:
Dancing with the Stars season 16 enters its fifth week, with fans having shown so far that if the stars can't dance, they won't last long. Dorothy Hamill bowed out, then American helped vote off country singer Wynonna Judd and reality star Lisa Vanderpump, as both showed they were two of the weakest dancers this season.

Will the fans continue to vote off the weakest dancers? Tonight, ABC adds to the difficulty with Len Goodman's side-by-side challenge. Can funny men D.L. Hughley and Andy Dick keep pace with the rest of the stars as the competition starts to get tougher?
item.author: editor@buddytv.com

item.title: ?The Amazing Race? Week 8 Likeability Rankings: Winning Proves to Be More Likeable
item.description:
For the third week in a row, Bates and Anthony dominated the race and came in first place, but did they top the likeability rankings with best friends Pam and Winnie gone? One thing is for sure this week -- season 22 of The Amazing Race just reached a whole new level of difficulty as teams raced through the frigid conditions in Switzerland trying to transport wheels of cheese. Teams were pushed to the limits physically and mentally on ?My Cheese is Out of Control." And we found out coming in last makes you a lot less likeable.

Download the BuddyTV Guide app for your phone now to find out which teams are leading season 22 of The Amazing Race.
item.author: editor@buddytv.com
